description:
Travel to over a dozen stunning
locales in your quest to become a
master angler. Fish in tranquil lakes,
rocky coastal waters, and more, all in
3D that brings every leaping fish and
splash of water to life. A huge variety
of fish will test the expertise of even
the most seasoned fishing veterans,
from wily bass to powerful Bluefin
tuna. 15 Stages, 40 Fish, and over
100 pieces of tackle! A variety of
fishing techniques, from bait fishing to
fly! Catch, keep, and care for fish in
two fully customisable 3D fish tanks!
name:
Reel Fishing
Paradise 3D
